metadata.title: CVE-2012-6128 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in http.c in OpenConnect before 4.08allow remote VPN gateways to cause a denial of service (application crash)via a long (1) hostname, (2) path, or (3) cookie list in a response.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 5.02-1
openconnect - 5.02-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.02-1').
